data.oai_dc:dc: Morphometric Data and Scripts for Analysis

This .zip file contains the following folders, with the following contents: "Raw Data" - TPS files containing raw landmark data collected from photographs of specimens, "Morphometric Data" - .TPS files containing shape data used in our analyses by the scripts in the "Scripts" folder, "Time Data" - Phylogenies and stratigraphic occurrence data for all species in our analyses, "Scripts" - R scripts used to analyze our datasets.
